EmailTemplate.name: Web Despatch Restricted Access non-CSSO
EmailTemplate.subject: Web Despatch is now View Only
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
A business of Australia Post
We’ve restricted your access to Web Despatch
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We recently invited you to start using Parcel Send.
We’ve already set up your account, so tap Register now and follow the prompts to start sending.
As of today, you have restricted access to Web Despatch. You can still view Proof of Deliveries (PODs), get your tracking information and obtain pricing estimates but you need to use Parcel Send to create and print labels.
We’ll let you know once these features are available in Parcel Send.
Visit our website for more information on getting the most out of Parcel Send.
Register now
Still have questions?
If you’ve got any questions, please email our friendly support team at lodgementmigration@auspost.com.au.
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
Terms & conditions | Privacy policy
